Class Map2

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Map2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Map2
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A Map is a background that reads and stores information about its colors. A Map knows its display location. A Map also knows how to draw Maps.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Map2

        public Map2(java.lang.String file,
            int sc,
            int x,
            int y)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a map with colors defined by the file and x and y displacement by parameters from Animation.
        Parameters:
        file - level filename
        sc - level scale factor
        x - x displacement for map scrolling
        y - y displacement for map scrolling
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws an exception if the file does not exist
        java.lang.Exception
